summary: Infeasible due to id_admin capacity bottleneck: three mandatory reset_credentials actions share overlapping tight windows and cannot be scheduled sequentially.

conflictSet.notes: Only one id_admin is available at any time bucket.
Total required id_admin time is 6 buckets, but the joint window allows at most 3 buckets.

rankedRepairs.description: Widen LFTs for non-mission-critical identity resets to allow sequential execution while preserving mission availability windows.
rankedRepairs.missionImpact: Low: identity hardening remains early but is spread across the first hour instead of 30 minutes.

rankedRepairs.description: If mission requires strict early windows, keep two mandatory resets and demote the third (lowest reward) to optional.
rankedRepairs.missionImpact: Medium: reduces immediate identity coverage; should be operator-approved.
